name: Russian Cars Multiplayer (REAL TAZs)
description:
REAL TAZs Multiplayer - is a real physics engine game. Ever wanted to try a cars racing multiplayer ? Now you can drive, drift and feel a car for free! Accurate physics engine that can deliver the most realistic racing fun possible.


****GAME FEATURES****
- Multiplayer game.
- Real dynamic game feeling with endless fun.
- Cars upgrades.
- Easy controller.
- Realistic acceleration.
- Beautiful graphics.
- Accurate physics.
